summary: Frontend testing of public website navigation redesign and module pages. All 7 requested features verified successfully: navigation links (Home, Workspace, Solutions, Intelligence), overview pages (/workspace-overview, /intelligence-overview), /solutions/commerce page, login flow, and Commerce module Customers/Vendors lists.

console_warnings.issue: React key warning - 'Each child in a list should have a unique key prop'
WebSocket connection closed before established (reconnects successfully)

critical_code_review_comments: Minor: React key warning in VendorsList - some vendor items may have duplicate keys
seed_data_creation: N/A - Using existing seed data (43 customers, 42 vendors)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Public website navigation redesign complete. All overview pages have rich content. Commerce module Customers/Vendors lists working with seed data.

workspace_overview_page.content: Your Team's Central Command - rich content about workspace modules (Chat, Channels, Tasks, Approvals)

intelligence_overview_page.content: Business Intelligence That Actually Works - AI-powered insights, real-time signals, predictive analytics

solutions_commerce_page.content: IB Commerce - Commercial Intelligence That Prevents Failure

login_flow.description: Login successful, redirected to workspace chats

commerce_customers_list.description: Customers list loads with seed data, proper UI with stats cards

commerce_vendors_list.description: Vendors list loads with seed data, proper UI with stats cards
